                             [ G a m e   N o t e s ]

 This is the latest and greatest arcade conversion from the gang at Sega PC.
 Rumor has it this version is even better than the Dreamcast one, though   
 we'll let you be the judge.  Sorry there isn't more to say about this one,
 but the back of the box is in Japanese.  For those who doubt, the game CD
 was multilingual, so what you've got here is the 100% English text/speech
 version.  If you want to play in French, German, Italian, Japanese, or
 whatnot then pick up the ISO.

 Features:

 -4 unique cars, each with adjustable option settings.

 -3 courses: desert, forest, &amp; mountain.

 -Arcade mode, Practice mode, or Championship mode.

 -Extensive record tracking.

 -Replay feature.

 -Hidden suprises.

 -2 car perspectives (Bumper perspective or Behind the Car) in 4 views.

 -7 different racing modes.

 -Two player split-screen option.


 Ripped: Help Files, Background Music, and Multilingual Support Files

 Special thanks to Class Japan, you know who you are!

                         [ I n s t a l l   N o t e s ]

   Unzip into any directory, then run INSTALL.EXE or unACE manually. If done
   manually, run REGSETUP.EXE to import the registry. Run SR2SETUP.EXE to
   setup your 3D Card, Sound Card &amp; Joystick, then run SEGA RALLY 2.EXE
   to play the game. Enjoy!

   Be sure to keep the background music OFF so you don't have any problems.
